content.en: Multi-agent pathfinding: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to solve the problem of multi-agent pathfinding. These algorithms, such as Increasing Cost Tree Search (ICTS), Push and Rotate, Conflict Based Search (CBS), SC-M*, Robust multi-agent pathfinding, and many others, are designed to efficiently navigate multiple agents in complex environments. By attributing agency to these algorithms, researchers aim to develop effective and robust solutions for multi-agent pathfinding challenges, including handling persistence conflicts, time uncertainty, incremental pathfinding, and collaborative coverage path planning.
content.da: Multi-agent stifinding: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at løse problemet med multi-agent stifinding. Disse algoritmer, såsom Increasing Cost Tree Search (ICTS), Push and Rotate, Conflict Based Search (CBS), SC-M*, Robust multi-agent stifinding og mange andre, er designet til effektivt at navigere flere agenter i komplekse miljøer. Ved at tilskrive agentur til disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at udvikle effektive og robuste løsninger til multi-agent stifindingsudfordringer, herunder håndtering af vedvarende konflikter, tidsusikkerhed, inkrementel stifinding og samarbejdende dækningsstiplanlægning.
